post_text: Dear EVCS Family Members, You are invited to attend tonight's WNY Charter School Parent Council meeting, being held at 564 Dodge, Building #400 from 5:30 - 7:00. One of the goals for tonight's meeting is to prepare for the group's January meeting with NYS Regent Catherine Collins, and for February's meeting with NYS Assembly Majority Leader Crystal Peoples-Stokes and NYS Senator Tim Kennedy. Please come with questions, concerns and ideas to share with our elected officials. Dinner and childcare will be provided. Come and help us to bring the voice of the charter school parents to our government!

EVCS students in all grades took part in the Hour of Code during their library classes this week. The Hour of Code is a worldwide event that introduces computer science and coding to students through fun, engaging activities.

Students created algorithms to guide characters through mazes, used Blockly coding language to navigate underwater Minecraft worlds, and programmed dance parties complete with pop songs, colorful background effects, and even animals flossing!

Check out the dance party coded by 1B students and Miss Rish: https://studio.code.org/projects/dance/7J5pzBRiTecAZJbfSswGFSJJxTDVRu14fKh3B94GYcU

To complete more programming, computer science, and digital citizenship activities at home, visit code.org and get coding!
